description.p: Magical Defence: Once per short rest, activating the magical protection of Pangolin gives resistance to one type of damage (fire, lightning, or cold) for 1 hour.
Upgrade: Reinforced Hinges (100 gold). Increases armour bonus to +2 AC. Provides reflexive shield as a reaction (cooldown 2 turns), which reduces the damage of the enemy attack by 1d4.
Upgrade: Elemental Infusion (150 gold). Provides elemental blast as an action once per short rest, which does 1d6 fire, lightning, or cold damage in a 10-foot cone.
Upgrade: Dynamic Cogs (200 gold). When elemental blast is used, movement speed is increased by 10 feet for 1 round.
Upgrade: Magical Stabiliser (250 gold). Allows elemental blast to be used twice per short rest, with a cooldown of 10 turns.
Upgrade: Reflective Cage (300 gold). Provides reflect as a reaction (cooldown 3 turns), which reflects 1d6 bludgeoning damage back to the attacker.
This is Bob. Bob is a Bag of Holding. Bob is always in a bad mood and likes to cheer itself up by surprising whoever is using him with useless, angry animals. Bob is an arsehole. Don't be like Bob.

This bag functions the same as a standard Bag of Holding, but the bag is possessed by a mischievous spirit. When reaching into the bag to retrieve an item, roll 1d4. On a 1, instead of grabbing the item you wanted, a random animal falls out. The animal behaves like an angry, surprised animal would naturally behave.
